title: OIT shader crashes with DX12 backend

labels.name: A-Rendering
labels.description: Drawing game state to the screen

labels.name: S-Waiting-on-Author
labels.description: The author needs to make changes or address concerns before this can be merged

body:
## Bevy version

master

## What you did

Run `order_independent_transparency` example with `WGPU_BACKEND = dx12`

## What went wrong

```
2024-10-09T08:59:03.651096Z ERROR wgpu_core::device::global: Device::create_render_pipeline error: Internal error in ShaderStages(FRAGMENT) shader: FXC D3DCompile error (0x80004005): E:\src\bevy\Shader@0x000001FFACB89500(246,15-75): error X3507: 'fragment': Not all control paths return a value
```

## Additional information

- Returning value from `oit_draw` was considered but not implemented? https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/pull/14876/files#r1780356792
- Simply adding `return` after `discard` might not work due to an upstream issue: https://github.com/gfx-rs/wgpu/issues/4416
